creator: chris.morgan@ama.ab.ca
text:
The mod_jk.so version 1.2.28 for Apache 2.0.X works until I add the second server then it stops working with no errors in the mod_jk.log even with debug mode turned on. It shows all of the standard setup values in the log but once I try to make the connection to Tomcat 4.1. (I know that this is very old, but I can not upgrade them at this time).

Seems to work until load balancing 2 servers, works with one but not two. 

I am not sure when this broke since we where using the 1.2.14 before the security notice.

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. The feature works in mod_jk 1.2.28. Your observation is most likely a configuration problem. Please post your information including configuration to the tomcat users list.

Sorry this turned out to be a configuration issue. I am running Virtual servers and JkMounts as of some version of mod_jk since 1.2.14 are no longer inherited in vertual servers unless you set global of JkMountCopy=All or withing the Virtual Server config JkMountCopy=On.
creator: chris.morgan@ama.ab.ca
